about_the_game:
Your career in the kitchen begins as an apprentice. On the way to becoming a chef, 27 original dishes from Sarah Wiener's famous cookery books are on the menu. Whether fine soups, hearty roasts, fine fish, tasty vegetarian dishes and delicious desserts, there is something for every taste.

All dishes are prepared by you according to the original recipes. There are also valuable tips for a healthy and varied diet - from buying the ingredients to the finished dish. With Sarah Wiener at your side, you can easily become a master of the art of cookery! After the game, you can recreate the dishes in your kitchen. Your guests will be delighted!

What the game offers you:
- Cooking and gaming fun for the whole family
- Sarah Wiener shows you her original recipes
- Playfully easy to cook
- Tasty ingredients, herbs, fruit, vegetables and tips on alternatives
- Health assessment and professional nutrition tips
- Simply learn to cook better

You can prepare the following dishes:
- Marinated aubergines
- Bruschetta
- Tomato and mozzarella skewers
- Potato soup with chanterelles
- Radish soup
- Szeged-style goulash soup
- Veal fillet with lime sauce
- Wiener schnitzel with potato salad
- Beef roulades with mashed potatoes
- Red couscous with wild herbs
- Stuffed asparagus omelette
- Moroccan ribbon noodles
- Matjes fillet with celery and bean salad
- Spinach and salmon lasagne
- Pikeperch with mustard crust
- Blackberry pancakes
- Rice casserole with apple sauce
- Raspberry and peach crisp
- Fennel quiche with herbs
- Monkfish with potato crust
- Devil chicken from Sri Lanka
- Swabian cheesecake
- Stuffed spinach balls
- Red snapper piccata
- Beetroot stuffed with goat curry
- Colourful dog with hot sauce
- Chocolate tartlet
